articles.description: Sam Kerr scored both goals in a 2-0 win over Tottenham to put Chelsea two points clear at the top of the WSL with one game to play
articles.content: Sam Kerr scored twice against Tottenham to put Chelsea tantalisingly close to retaining their Womens Super League title on Wednesday. With one game left to play, against Reading on Sunday, and a two-… [+3987 chars]
